website_summaries.verdict: With 60" legs, this tripod grill gives you more height than most other models, making it superior for dutch oven cooking.
pros: All-steel construction with high-temperature black finish
Height is ideal for dutch oven cooking
Strong legs won't bend or bow
cons: With long legs like these, you'll need to drive them into the ground a little to keep the tripod stable

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. I found it to be very stable. I added a webber grill/grate so I can either hang the dutch oven or grill over the fire. Made a case out of 3 inch PVC. Very happy with the product. Only used 1 camping trip, but based on the materials I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you set up this thing right
customer_reviews.text: I see that almost everyone was set up this tripod the wrong way. Go to YouTube and search for "Camping tripod setup" and you will see how it should be done. Don't just spread it out a little bit to make it stable. This way is much more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio D.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty cast iron tripod is stable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tripod to hold a cast iron pot over a backyard campfire. It works just as I'd planned. This is a heavy cast iron model. I've seen others that are more lightweight but that also means they are more flimsy. This one is strong and heavy and I don't worry that it will fall over or collapse under the weight of a heavy dutch oven filled with food. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Delily

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's solid steel construction and the chain appears to be made of stainless. The angular bend on the main pole is poor. If you are not careful the other poles may slide out while you are setting the tripod up. The angled loop just needs to be heated up and hammered a bit more closed. Then this tripod is just fine. It would be better if they had used a more traditional ring and loop design but this one is okay for a mass produced item for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: RWE

customer_reviews.title: Lodge Tall Boy Tripod
customer_reviews.text: The tall boy tripod is good quality and is the right size for using dutch oven cooking. I mistakenly ordered the 43" one because the ad didn't give the size and I thought lodge only carried a 60" one. Amazon was great and took it back and paid for the shipping because of the lack of sizing in the ad. I think the smaller one is too limiting and the tall boy gets the Dutch oven high enough to keep a large fire from burning your meal or keeping things warm. I would highly recommend this tripod with it nice long and heavy chain.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Boenig

customer_reviews.title: They make the best only the best  The quality is  The best
customer_reviews.text: But it stop looking u need to go no further lodge is the best all ways has been The best cast iron quality in the whole world they do not cheap out I own so much of their stuff and always 100% satisfied and you will be too
customer_reviews.author: Anthony sperry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heavy tripod to use with my new 12 quart cast iron dutch oven. I used it this weekend several times, filled to the top with chili and stew. The pot is very heavy, and adding the food it was close to 50 pounds. The massive chain and sturdy poles held up like a champ! Now my son wants one! It is long and does not break down in sections (which would compromise it's strength), but I was able to fit it in my back seat with no problem. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I uxed this with a Lodge 8 quart Dutch Oven over a wood fire at a tailgate party yesterday. Since the local football team really sucks (NY Jets), we primarily go for the food and the fun of outdoor cooking. I made a big pot of chili in this and it was awesome. I don;t know what the load rating is, but I would say it was at least 40 pounds with the chili, and it wasn't stressed at all. Definitely a good buy, perhaps some of the less than positive comments may have been user error.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, and now even better.
customer_reviews.text: To all wondering about the modification in the comments by other people, 3 words: just do it. The parts and peices (and the sturdy grate) weren't cheap, but wow does it make this tripod excellent! Its sturdy, and made of really strong metal, but adjusting the chain when there's a hot fire underneath is not doable, especially if there's something heavy on it. Adding the pulley and cable system make a 5 star tripod a 10.
customer_reviews.author: P.Patty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for old time cooking, or your next camping trip!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tripod in order to use our dutch oven over a wood campfire. I was making maple syrup the old fashioned way, outdoors in the snow over a hot campfire. The weight of the oven and sap was never a problem for this tripod - it never slipped or had any stability problems in the wet ground. I can say definitely that this is a keeper for any tripod cooking needs. The syrup was amazing, by the way, and I look forward to using this next year to make some more.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Pilbeam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool to hold a Maple Syrup Evaporating Kettle
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tripod to use in boiling maple sap for syrup. It is very heavy and sturdy to hod a pot or kettle over the fire. It held the weighted boiling pot without complaint, and gave us confidence in the outcome. The trupod is at the right height and was very easy to set up. Fit and finish were/are excellent. An excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: It's very solidly built. Worked well camping, and there was no problem sticking the tripod directly in the fire ring. The chain and hook are sturdy as well, and had no problem holding up my Dutch oven. Note that each leg of this thing is a single piece, so if you put it in a small car like I did, it may end up sticking out into the front seat area.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Peters

customer_reviews.title: Very good campfire tripod
customer_reviews.text: My brother has one of these and I knew I wanted one because of how well his works. The price came down and ordered it. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little tweaking
customer_reviews.text: The height is perfect for a campfire or fire pit. Legs are each one piece of sturdy material. But, there is an opening in the main pole loop that is supposed to hold all of the poles together at the top; the opening is too wide so the pole closest to the hole slips out. We almost lost a pot of Low Country Boil the first time we used it. We'll try to heat the main pole up and squeeze the loop closer to avoid future disasters.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: What I expected, and then some ... Absolutely love this thing ! Plenty strong enough for anything I throw at it ... 100% Satisfaction ! I liked it so much, that I bought a second one - I now have dueling tripods whenever we have a large group get-together !
customer_reviews.author: R. PARKER

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: The tripod works well for our use. Our fire ring is an old truck rim set on a gravel pad. The added height allows plenty of room for a dutch oven or grill screen above the top of the fire ring. Sets up easy and after adjusting the legs approx 120 degrees apart very sturdy. Well made. We store ours in a 60" piece of 2 1/2 PVC pipe
customer_reviews.author: M. Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: great quality product with a low price!
customer_reviews.text: Can't hardly buy the metal to make one at this price... It was easy to set up. It held a 20 qt Dutch oven over the coals easily and evenly. Just the right height... chain did not get hot so that when I needed to adjust it, I did not even need gloves! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: soldier

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is suppose to. The chain I had to modify, because the hook will work with a wire but on one of my dutch ovens I have the wire/spring wound handle grip and the chain would not fit around it. I just got another larger s-hook and attached it to the other end. Now all is covered. I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: miles

customer_reviews.title: lodge , great product !
customer_reviews.text: this is very sturdy and stable had a bout 30lbs including pot and chili and it was awesome only wish they were just a little taller because we used it with a free standing firepit and it was just a little close but not really a problem . dont wast your money on the cheaper ones it bought 2 beforw the lodge 60"
customer_reviews.author: michael funaro

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Lodge to start with is quality. Paint, metal thickness, sturdy is standard as for quality. Please observe picture, that prove that this item is part of our BBQ equipment. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Glad I finally got one.
customer_reviews.text: We do a fair amount of horse trailer and camper type camping. Holds a big cast pot very well. I made my own chain and grate setup to hang the gate above fire.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The best part is the movement causes the food to heat ...
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy about this thing and use it all of the time over my fire pit. Friends now all want to get one.The best part is the movement causes the food to heat evenly without burning in some areas and undercooked in others. Therefore you do not have to keep moving the food, just keep the grill swinging.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of strength!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and PLENTY of strength. I use it to hold my larger dutch ovens over the fire loaded heavy with soups/stews. No issues from a strength standpoint at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mills

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait?
customer_reviews.text: No idea why I waited to get this...it is exceptionally practical and excellent value. If you have a camp dutch oven and cook over fire you NEED this.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Hiller

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: it is exactly what I wanted, very simple, tall enough to allow major options in leg spacing around stuff that is in the way, long chain, complete freedom in height adjustment for the pot. Steel bar, painted I think, or maybe powder coated, can't tell right now. But these legs are going to be in the fire! A few squirts of rustolem (sp) if you're that silly can clean them up. I got two. John Blackburn
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, Name Brand, Very Rugged. And a Price that can't be matched. I have used this over several different sized fire rings in campgrounds and never had a problem. Very thick legs and chains.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S

customer_reviews.title: I like it but she doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It gets me and my dog in plenty of trouble with the wife. We cook stuff at the horse pasture and have fun. My dog likes it to LOL. Great for camping or just sitting around.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Tripod, It Works Very Well.
customer_reviews.text: This worked exactly as I hoped. I have a large stag horn fern that I have to bring indoors when the temperature drops. The tripod is sturdy enough to hang my 55 pound fern. Excellent product and I'm very, very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Omeara pensacola

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Held up great with an 8qt cast iron Dutch oven. Very sturdy and very adjustable. Well worth it if you like cooking outdoors with cast iron!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Lodge 5TP2 Tall Boy Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy tripod. I can use it over our fire pit or an open fire. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Scratch

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this weekend over a nice fire with a cast iron pot full of sloppy Joes. Highly recommend. Was easy to set up, was nice & sturdy. Chain was easy to lower or move higher. Worked perfect for us, husband said it would hold my largest cast iron pot with no problem. I did buy the storage bag & glad I did, it fit perfectly, I did put a lid from a laundry detergent bottle in the bottom of the bag as someone had suggested to keep it from wearing. Buy it, and cook something good for your family & enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L Stueber

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works good, is nice and level, and held our Dutch oven over the fire and made a mean roast!
customer_reviews.author: michele c.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Have used it many times, hang Cast iron Dutch Oven on it, hang coffee pot on as well! Very good quality, would definitely order again if the need arises!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a pot over the fire.  The long legs are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Love this with a 10 quart cast iron pot. A perfect combo. Love the longer legs. Great to keep what we're cooking high over the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda S. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our Lodge Dutch oven. Very study. We're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen F.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Arrived damaged but not the sellers fault.
customer_reviews.author: cheeseheadjf

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Tall.
customer_reviews.text: Strong cast iron stand. Tall and easily adjustable. Worked well for cooking chili in my Dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Make camp food great again!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for campfire cooking. Lots of height adjustment. Great finish to stand the heat
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Warner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tripod for the campfires!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and great product! Glad I finally got to purchase one of these!
customer_reviews.author: CoRaY

customer_reviews.title: Camping Must
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who loves cooking over the fire when we camp! We did add some chains and a flat cooking rack! It does great!!
customer_reviews.author: MollyMSRN

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor cooking ,over the fire pit stand.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly above my fire pit. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simmer it slow over an open flame
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is exactly what I've been wanting to complete my outdoor cooking needs this summer - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Warren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tripod
customer_reviews.text: This tripod joins a smaller one I bought. It will handle heavier pots and I look forward to many years of use. As for the chain that comes with it, I find it is heavy duty and capable of holding the heaviest of my pots. I am very well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tripod cooking system but wanted one tall enough to get my food away from the heat. I decided to try this one because it was the tallest I found that was resonable in price. It is well built and sturdy. Not much more to say because for the money it is a great tripod. I did make a grill grate system for it to make it more versital with what I can cook.
customer_reviews.author: RJT

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and large. Would hold a very large cauldron.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy weight construction for the price. It is made in China my only concern.
customer_reviews.author: NIdaho

customer_reviews.title: Nice height  over open fires
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish it came with was just a case to store it in . Guess I need the wife to make one . otherwise it is well built and designed to handle the heavier loads .
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I love cooking over a fire. We will be taking this camping.
customer_reviews.author: Charron

customer_reviews.title: sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I read the reviews of the smaller one I was about to buy. This one is tall enough to hold our large dutch oven over the flame and still have room to move it up and down to make it hotter/cooler. The chain stays cool so we can move it up or down while cooking without any trouble. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bravo

customer_reviews.title: RV must have
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but you gotta have it if you RV.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - handled the weight of my cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed using tripod to cook over an open campfire. I feel it is a necessity when cooking this way. Very reliable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy and will hold a very heavy pot. However longer legs would be strongly preferred for the purposes I will use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, we have a lot of Lodge products so this will be a lot of fun for camping, which it was already used for camping.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No box, no chain, couldn't forge for less than the sale price, so It's OK
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several tripods(online)before buying this one. I made the right choice. It did come with the chain and it does not include a bag. The metal is thick and sturdy and the leg heighth is perfect. Buying one with shorter legs would make my dutch oven temp too hot and the adjustable chain makes it is easy to create a perfect cooking temperature. I look forward to many years of campfire cooking.
customer_reviews.author: House Music

customer_reviews.title: Solid, strong, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: We use it over a 29" fire pit and it works beautifully. Nice heavy metal
customer_reviews.author: deirdrebeth

customer_reviews.title: Strong but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Definitely built sturdy, seems a bit expensive for what you’re actually getting
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Fraudulent advertising Amazon site says “Made in the USA” The box says “Made in China” I chose this because it said it was Made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Not a secure tripod
customer_reviews.text: This is anything but sturdy-not sure if it was a defect or not but it would not secure in any position- one leg fell off and now it is unusable- unfortunately didn’t try it when we ordered it since it was winter-would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Typical Lodge- well made ( even if it is from China).
customer_reviews.text: Happy. It’s heavy duty and looks like it will hold up to hard work. Nice heavy chain too.
customer_reviews.author: EcoTico

customer_reviews.title: Size Means Everything
customer_reviews.text: I considered the smaller tripod at first but decided on the Tall Boy to hold my cast iron kettle when boiling peanuts over an open fire all day. A wise decision that suits my needs. Thanks again, Amazon. I seem to be one of those customers who continue to receive great service.
customer_reviews.author: Atsagottaclass

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy duty, useful addition to my cast iron collection and usage.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, so much easier to use my lodge Dutch oven. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JoeDog

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got it! Several attempts from other sellers were all cancelled mid shipment by them! Works well and very basic but well built.
customer_reviews.author: Al B.

customer_reviews.title: Lodge is the best!
customer_reviews.text: One of several Lodge items purchased as Christmas present for my grandson, He loves cast iron, and Lodge is tops in that category -- especially for camping. He was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: This is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Move the hook from between the legs as other reviews have suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good times
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to your cast iron dutch oven cooking arsenal! Stout legs, simple design, easily adjustable and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Quimby

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable, this stayed outside for half the year where we cooked over a fire pit. Low or no wear visible all over.
customer_reviews.author: Fun in the Sun

customer_reviews.title: Lodge Tall Boy Tripod
customer_reviews.text: Lodge makes good stuff and this is no exception to the quality. We've tried various utilities other than that of a cooking support. With a bit of imagination even the chain can be used for a number of contributions to the base camp.
customer_reviews.author: momentum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, probably 1/2 round stock. You will never bend or bow this product!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Branstine

customer_reviews.title: but its sturdy and will be really nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Had I seen this in person I would probably of made my own, but its sturdy and will be really nice to have. Simple and strong.
customer_reviews.author: joann

customer_reviews.title: Strong like bull
customer_reviews.text: Nice and strong, perfect for your lodge cast iron pots. It comes with chain to hold your pot above a fire. Just make sure to bring something to wipe the legs down before you put it back in your car!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tripod - but be advised
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tripod, that's what i would expect from Lodge and that's what i received. Heavy duty and durable,good quality heavy duty chain also included .The best thing about this item may also be its worst- It is really quite tall/large. Not easily packed for transport and somewhat unwieldy but I guarantee you it will hold just about any pot that you own. And its height is better than any other tripod that is reasonably priced. Buy this tripod but be advised this is not a tripod for car camping if u don't own a large vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Mister_TTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Lodge Product
customer_reviews.text: Great compliment to the Lodge L10C03. We made Buffalo Chili while camping and this unit worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Barker

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use for our camping trips. We hang our dutch oven and coffee pot from it. it is sturdy and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Pool

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and super easy to use. Expect it to last for years
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad I went with tall boy. It fits over my fire ring.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Kovach

customer_reviews.title: Tall and portable
customer_reviews.text: The weight is nice and it holds up a really heavy old dutch oven. The hinge is a little looser than I would like but I suppose it helps you change the stance of the footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Wind Chime Holder
customer_reviews.text: I used this to hold a heavy and long wind chime. I would have preferred it taller, but then I'm not using it for what it was designed for.
customer_reviews.author: George C.

customer_reviews.title: It would be perfect if it came with a grate
customer_reviews.text: It would be perfect if it came with a grate. I found a chain kit at Wal-Mart and used a grate from a round grill.
customer_reviews.author: 5001craig

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be pretty sturdy and has a nice heavy chain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my father because he likes cooking over fires. Seems to be pretty sturdy and has a nice heavy chain.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I love this tripod. The chain and legs are heavy duty and I believe we will get many years of use from it. It is sturdy and holds a great deal of weight over a fire. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to cook over an open fire.
customer_reviews.author: phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was the perfect fit for my extra large and heavy cauldron. thanks. Great price and quick shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy when set up. Added 2 extra chains for a grate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Conaway

customer_reviews.title: Tripod good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, thought it would be taller, but discovered it was plenty tall enough after using it the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Pcnative

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, I also use it to hold my lantern
customer_reviews.author: Eric Zink

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid unit which works exactly as it was designed to. Especially like the fact that the chain can be raised or lowered, which is basically like turning your burner up to high heat or down to low.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tripod for any camp fire.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, nice heavy chain. Glad I bought the larger one. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bill K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up and use. Hope to use it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: kilowatt hunter

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed packaging
customer_reviews.text: Package was destroyed and contents was hanging out and held in with tape.
customer_reviews.author: Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The box was a bit beat up when it arrived but tripod was unharmed and complete!
customer_reviews.author: George Lae

customer_reviews.title: though it seems to me that the legs could be a little heavier but I do think the tripod will work just fine.
customer_reviews.text: The tripod seems to be well made, though it seems to me that the legs could be a little heavier but I do think the tripod will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Neal E. Smith Sr.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: perfect size, can't wait to cook with it tomorrow with my dutch oven. it was here in 2 days.......!!!!! Dewey
customer_reviews.author: dewey d barnes jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and of good quality. Very satisfied with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Christan Craig

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made. I'd thought about ordering the shorter one, but now I'm glad I went with the taller model. It will be used in a semi-permanent location, so I don't have to worry too much about portability. I don't think that the shorter model would have worked as well for me.
customer_reviews.author: TonyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Lodge Tall Bot Tri Pod
customer_reviews.text: Recently received this item by Fed X in a timely manner. One drawback is that they didn't send the chain or the S Hook. Package was beat-up upon arrival! Decided not worth the wait to send the item back to Amazon and receive the full package. Went to my local hardware store and purchased 36'' of good heavy chain for abot 5 bucks with a S Hook. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Does what needs to be done...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large Lodge dutch oven and wanted to suspend it above the fire to cook beans all day. This device does the trick. Came with a heavy duty chain with hook. I can adjust the cooking by raising or lowering the chain. Not much to it... but when you need a tripod, this one will exceed your expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Well built and really added to the cooking experience. We are sold on Lodge.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is great! works great. sturdy. I would recommend you buy this tripod!
customer_reviews.author: danny lemaster

product_meta.title: Lodge 5TP2 Tall Boy Tripod ,Black
product_meta.description: Size:60-InchThe solid steel construction and adjustable chain make the Lodge tripod an excellent way to hang Dutch ovens and enjoy the great outdoors with great food. This large tripod features 60 inch legs with 36 inch chain. All-steel construction with high-temp black finish. Other sizes available: Lodge Camp Dutch Oven Tripod has 43. 5 inch legs with 24 inch chain (3TP2). Warning: This product can expose you to chemicals including Chromium (Hexavalent Compounds) which is known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm.
